Title: Crush Girl Love Panic
Plot: Conrad is beginning to grow suspicious of Nancy's actions after the bust on the grow houses. Shane joins the debate team at school. Celia gets in the way when Isabelle goes to shoot her Huskeroos commercial. Isabelle talks to Doug about something she doesn't want her mother to know about. Nancy has a surprise for the men in her life.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Ron Canada, Sammy Fine, John Paul Mitchell, David Bardeen, Remy Auberjonois, Thomas Burr, Christine Joaquin
